text: Center Grove is an extinct town in Atchison County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The GNIS classifies it as a populated place, but the precise location of the town site is unknown. A post office called Center Grove was established in 1858, and remained in operation until 1866. The community was named for its location at the geographical center of Lincoln Township. ==References== Category:Ghost towns in Missouri Category:Former populated places in Atchison County, Missouri
title: Center Grove, Missouri
